name: Vaccines
description: Many Planned Parenthood health centers offer at least one vaccine, and some offer more options to help your body protect against certain illnesses. We offer services in: - Hepatitis B vaccine - HPV vaccine - COVID-19 vaccine - Flu vaccine
fullDescription: Many Planned Parenthood health centers offer at least one vaccine, and some offer more options to help your body protect against certain illnesses. We offer services in: - Hepatitis B vaccine - HPV vaccine - COVID-19 vaccine - Flu vaccine
whatTheyOffer: Many Planned Parenthood health centers offer at least one vaccine, and some offer more options to help your body protect against certain illnesses. We offer services in: - Hepatitis B vaccine - HPV vaccine - COVID-19 vaccine - Flu vaccine
howToGetIt: Not every Planned Parenthood health center provides all services. Check with your nearest Planned Parenthood health center about the services they offer. Talk to Planned Parenthood staff online or in-person at your local health center to get the care you need. Make an appointment online or call 1-800-230-PLAN.
agency: Planned Parenthood - San Francisco Health Center
